page.title: 14Local Employment.
page.content: Fifty people answered the question - 'Do you have to travel far to work?' 7 people work in Leamington Spa. 4 people work in Warwick. 4 people work in Stratford upon Avon. 10 people travel to Coventry or further. Also included are those who have no fixed place of work. 25 people work in or around Moreton Morrell. These figures reflect the employment charateristics of the village. People move to the village as a pleasant place to live. They tend to have houses valued in excess of Â£70,000. However, they work away from the area. Whereas, many of those living and working in the area have homes tied to their work. The College of Agriculture employs several men to run the farm throughout the year. Each has a house whilst employed by the College.
